message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save money, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $110. Would you be willing to go for that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can go up to $105, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
